definitions.definition: A person who likes or tends to express a contradicting viewpoint , especially from one held by a majority of people, usually because of nonconformity or spite .
A financial investor who tends to have an opinion of market trends at variance with most others.

main_definition: A person who likes or tends to express a contradicting viewpoint , especially from one held by a majority of people, usually because of nonconformity or spite . [from mid 20th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( finance ) A financial investor who tends to have an opinion of market trends at variance with most others.
